title: ALFA: POM: Enable M-API POM for B2B Orders
description:
Description
For B2B (Mid Market) Customers it should be able to send fixed net orders via M-API POM.
Overview of Adaptions
Channel
Order Characteristics
North & Westbound Adaptions
Event Handling
Details
There are some adaptions needed, which are described on the following page:
https://wiki.telekom.de/display/OAGGARD/MAPI+POM+B2B+Enabler+Epics
